name: Dylan B Allen
short_description: CEO & Co-Founder of Cheers (YC S24). Dylan is a tech entrepreneur who has been recognized for his innovation and has a background in multiple languages including Spanish, Swedish, and English.
long_description:
Dylan B Allen is the CEO & Co-Founder of Cheers, a startup that was accepted into Y Combinator's Summer 2024 batch (YC S24). He has demonstrated entrepreneurial skills that have earned him recognition, including placing in the top 20 of the Student Innovator of the Year competition in Utah after pitching his startup idea to tech investors in February 2022.

Dylan has a connection to the Marriott School of Business, where he was recognized on the Dean's List in April 2021, suggesting he has an educational background in business. He is also an Eagle Scout, having earned this achievement from the Boy Scouts of America in April 2016.

He is multilingual, with professional working proficiency in Spanish, elementary proficiency in Swedish, and native proficiency in English. Based on a recommendation from Adnan Chowdhury, Dylan has experience in frontend engineering and product management, showing a well-rounded skill set that combines technical and business acumen.

Dylan appears to be building a following on LinkedIn with 4K followers and over 500 connections, indicating his growing professional network in the tech and startup ecosystem.
